thread.title: MR P RICHARDSON
thread.title_full: Uttings reviewed by MR P RICHARDSON

author: MR P RICHARDSON
title: MR P RICHARDSON
text: To be honest id say a three and a half because my order was mixed up. but due to the outstanding customer service by staff they easily deserve a 4 star rating for going above and beyond in correcting the problem. would recommend. its the excellent prices that bring customers in but its the Staff like these that make business's like these prosper and keep people coming back for more 4 stars easily xxx thanks
